Package ch.idsia.crema.inference

Interface Inference<M extends GraphicalModel<?>,​F extends GenericFactor>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The model
    F - The actual Factor type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InferenceJoined<M,​F>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApproxLP0, ApproxLP1, ApproxLP2, BeliefPropagation, ConditionalVariableElimination, CredalApproxLP, CredalVariableElimination, FactorEliminationModel, FactorVariableElimination, LikelihoodWeightingSampling, LogicSampling, LoopyBeliefPropagation, SePolyVE, StochasticSampling, VariableElimination
    public interface Inference<M extends GraphicalModel<?>,​F extends GenericFactor>
    Common interface of inference algorithm. Any model preprocessing requirements of the final inference algorithm must be performed byt the query method.
    Author:
    davidhuber

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default F query​(M model, int query)
      Perform an inference.
      F query​(M model, gnu.trove.map.TIntIntMap evidence, int query)
      Perform an inference.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        F query​(M model,
        gnu.trove.map.TIntIntMap evidence,
        int query)
        Perform an inference.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to use for inference
        evidence - the observed variable as a map of variable-states
        query - the variable that will be queried
        Returns:
        the result of the inference
